channel.title: Matrix 718/724
channel.description:
This is [b]Matrix[/b] 718/724 source i added a "lib" folder which fixed all 80 errors that you get when you download it. Working on the client ATM everyone. -dragonkk hopefully u read this and fix ur release!
[[u][b]source link[/b][/u]] [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/62507364/lib.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/62507364/lib.rar[/url]
EXTRACT THE LIB FOLDER FROM THE .RAR THEN INSERT THE FOLDER INTO THE MATRIX SOURCE THEN COMPILE. IF U NEED HELP SKYPE ME: XDETRICK [virus scans below, click the picture to get a bigger view]
